001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003/**
004 * A low-quality continuous noise generator with strong grid artifacts, this is nonetheless useful as a building block.
005 * This implements Noise1D, Noise2D, Noise3D, Noise4D, Noise5D, and Noise6D, and could have more dimensionality support
006 * added later. It has much lower quality than {@link ClassicNoise}, but is structured similarly in many ways, and
007 * should be a little faster.
008 * <br>
009 * Note: the {@link #valueNoise(int, double, double)} methods in this class return results in the range of 0.0 to 1.0,
010 * while the {@link #getNoise(double, double)} and {@link #getNoiseWithSeed(double, double, long)} methods use the Noise
011 * class default range of -1.0 to 1.0.
012 * @see FoamNoise FoamNoise produces high-quality noise by combining a few rotated results of ValueNoise with domain warping.
013 * @see PhantomNoise PhantomNoise doesn't use this class directly, but does have its own way of generating arbitrary-dimensional value noise.
014 */
015public class ValueNoise implements Noise.Noise1D, Noise.Noise2D, Noise.Noise3D,
016        Noise.Noise4D, Noise.Noise5D, Noise.Noise6D {
017    public static final ValueNoise instance = new ValueNoise();
018    
019    public int seed = 0xD1CEBEEF;
020    public ValueNoise() {
021    }
022
023    public ValueNoise(int seed) {
024        this.seed = seed;
025    }
026
027    public ValueNoise(long seed) {
028        this.seed = (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32);
029    }
030
031    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x) {
032        final int STEPX = 0x9E377;
033        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
034        x -= xFloor;
035        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
036        xFloor *= STEPX;
037        seed ^= seed >>> 17;
038        return ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, seed))
039                * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
040    }
041
042    /**
043     * Doesn't need anything special, makes a 10-bit hash.
044     * @param x any int, doesn't need to be premultiplied.
045     * @param s state, any int
046     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
047     */
048    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, int s) {
049        s *= ((x ^ x >>> 12) | 1);
050        s += (x ^ x >>> 16) * 0xAC451;
051        return (s >>> 3 ^ s >>> 10) & 0x3FF;
052    }
053
054    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y)
055    {
056        final int STEPX = 0xD1B55;
057        final int STEPY = 0xABC99;
058        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
059        x -= xFloor;
060        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
061        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
062        y -= yFloor;
063        y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
064        xFloor *= STEPX;
065        yFloor *= STEPY;
066        return ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, seed))
067                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, seed)))
068                * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * Constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even.
073     * They should normally be used for the 3D version of R2, but we only use 2 of the 3 constants.
074     * @param x should be premultiplied by 0xD1B55
075     * @param y should be premultiplied by 0xABC99
076     * @param s state, any int
077     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
078     */
079    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, int s) {
080        s += x ^ y;
081        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
082    }
083
084    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y, double z)
085    {
086        final int STEPX = 0xDB4F1;
087        final int STEPY = 0xBBE05;
088        final int STEPZ = 0xA0F2F;
089        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
090        x -= xFloor;
091        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
092        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
093        y -= yFloor;
094        y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
095        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
096        z -= zFloor;
097        z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
098        xFloor *= STEPX;
099        yFloor *= STEPY;
100        zFloor *= STEPZ;
101        return ((1 - z) *
102                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, seed))
103                        + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, seed)))
104                + z * 
105                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, seed))
106                        + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, seed)))
107                ) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
108    }
109
110    /**
111     * Constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even.
112     * They should normally be used for the 4D version of R2, but we only use 3 of the 4 constants.
113     * @param x should be premultiplied by 0xDB4F1
114     * @param y should be premultiplied by 0xBBE05
115     * @param z should be premultiplied by 0xA0F2F
116     * @param s state, any int
117     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
118     */
119    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, final int z, int s) {
120        s += x ^ y ^ z;
121        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
122    }
123
124    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y, double z, double w)
125    {
126        final int STEPX = 0xE19B1;
127        final int STEPY = 0xC6D1D;
128        final int STEPZ = 0xAF36D;
129        final int STEPW = 0x9A695;
130        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
131        x -= xFloor;
132        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
133        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
134        y -= yFloor;
135        y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
136        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
137        z -= zFloor;
138        z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
139        int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
140        w -= wFloor;
141        w *= w * (3 - 2 * w);
142        xFloor *= STEPX;
143        yFloor *= STEPY;
144        zFloor *= STEPZ;
145        wFloor *= STEPW;
146        return ((1 - w) *
147                ((1 - z) *
148                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, seed))
149                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, seed)))
150                        + z *
151                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, seed))
152                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, seed))))
153                + (w *
154                ((1 - z) *
155                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, seed))
156                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, seed)))
157                        + z *
158                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, seed))
159                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, seed)))
160                ))) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
161    }
162
163    /**
164     * Constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even.
165     * They should normally be used for the 5D version of R2, but we only use 4 of the 5 constants.
166     * @param x should be premultiplied by 0xE19B1
167     * @param y should be premultiplied by 0xC6D1D
168     * @param z should be premultiplied by 0xAF36D
169     * @param w should be premultiplied by 0x9A695
170     * @param s state, any int
171     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
172     */
173    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, final int z, final int w, int s) {
174        s += x ^ y ^ z ^ w;
175        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
176    }
177
178    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y, double z, double w, double u)
179    {
180        final int STEPX = 0xE60E3;
181        final int STEPY = 0xCEBD7;
182        final int STEPZ = 0xB9C9B;
183        final int STEPW = 0xA6F57;
184        final int STEPU = 0x9609D;
185        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
186        x -= xFloor;
187        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
188        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
189        y -= yFloor;
190        y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
191        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
192        z -= zFloor;
193        z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
194        int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
195        w -= wFloor;
196        w *= w * (3 - 2 * w);
197        int uFloor = u >= 0 ? (int) u : (int) u - 1;
198        u -= uFloor;
199        u *= u * (3 - 2 * u);
200        xFloor *= STEPX;
201        yFloor *= STEPY;
202        zFloor *= STEPZ;
203        wFloor *= STEPW;
204        uFloor *= STEPU;
205        return ((1 - u) *
206                        ((1 - w) *
207                                ((1 - z) *
208                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed))
209                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed)))
210                                        + z *
211                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, seed))
212                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, seed))))
213                                + (w *
214                                ((1 - z) *
215                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed))
216                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed)))
217                                        + z *
218                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed))
219                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, seed)))
220                                )))
221                        + (u *
222                        ((1 - w) *
223                                ((1 - z) *
224                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed))
225                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed)))
226                                        + z *
227                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed))
228                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, seed))))
229                                + (w *
230                                ((1 - z) *
231                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed))
232                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed)))
233                                        + z *
234                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed))
235                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, seed)))
236                                ))))
237        ) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
238    }
239
240    /**
241     * Constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even.
242     * They should normally be used for the 6D version of R2, but we only use 5 of the 6 constants.
243     * @param x should be premultiplied by 0xE60E3
244     * @param y should be premultiplied by 0xCEBD7
245     * @param z should be premultiplied by 0xB9C9B
246     * @param w should be premultiplied by 0xA6F57
247     * @param u should be premultiplied by 0x9609D
248     * @param s state, any int
249     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
250     */
251    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, final int z, final int w, final int u, int s) {
252        s += x ^ y ^ z ^ w ^ u;
253        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
254    }
255
256    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v)
257    {
258        final int STEPX = 0xE95E1;
259        final int STEPY = 0xD4BC7;
260        final int STEPZ = 0xC1EDB;
261        final int STEPW = 0xB0C8B;
262        final int STEPU = 0xA127B;
263        final int STEPV = 0x92E85;
264        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
265        x -= xFloor;
266        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
267        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
268        y -= yFloor;
269        y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
270        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
271        z -= zFloor;
272        z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
273        int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
274        w -= wFloor;
275        w *= w * (3 - 2 * w);
276        int uFloor = u >= 0 ? (int) u : (int) u - 1;
277        u -= uFloor;
278        u *= u * (3 - 2 * u);
279        int vFloor = v >= 0 ? (int) v : (int) v - 1;
280        v -= vFloor;
281        v *= v * (3 - 2 * v);
282        xFloor *= STEPX;
283        yFloor *= STEPY;
284        zFloor *= STEPZ;
285        wFloor *= STEPW;
286        uFloor *= STEPU;
287        vFloor *= STEPV;
288        return ((1 - v) *
289                ((1 - u) *
290                        ((1 - w) *
291                                ((1 - z) *
292                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
293                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed)))
294                                        + z *
295                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
296                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed))))
297                                + (w *
298                                ((1 - z) *
299                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
300                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed)))
301                                        + z *
302                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
303                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor, seed)))
304                                )))
305                        + (u *
306                        ((1 - w) *
307                                ((1 - z) *
308                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed))
309                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed)))
310                                        + z *
311                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed))
312                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed))))
313                                + (w *
314                                ((1 - z) *
315                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed))
316                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed)))
317                                        + z *
318                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed))
319                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor, seed)))
320                                )))))
321                + (v *
322                ((1 - u) *
323                        ((1 - w) *
324                                ((1 - z) *
325                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
326                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
327                                        + z *
328                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
329                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed))))
330                                + (w *
331                                ((1 - z) *
332                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
333                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
334                                        + z *
335                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
336                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
337                                )))
338                        + (u *
339                        ((1 - w) *
340                                ((1 - z) *
341                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
342                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
343                                        + z *
344                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
345                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed))))
346                                + (w *
347                                ((1 - z) *
348                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
349                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
350                                        + z *
351                                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed))
352                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + STEPX, yFloor + STEPY, zFloor + STEPZ, wFloor + STEPW, uFloor + STEPU, vFloor + STEPV, seed)))
353                                ))))))
354        ) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
355    }
356
357    /**
358     * Constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even.
359     * They should normally be used for the 7D version of R2, but we only use 6 of the 7 constants.
360     * @param x should be premultiplied by 0xE95E1
361     * @param y should be premultiplied by 0xD4BC7
362     * @param z should be premultiplied by 0xC1EDB
363     * @param w should be premultiplied by 0xB0C8B
364     * @param u should be premultiplied by 0xA127B
365     * @param v should be premultiplied by 0x92E85
366     * @param s state, any int
367     * @return a mediocre 10-bit hash
368     */
369    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, final int z, final int w, final int u, final int v, int s) {
370        s += x ^ y ^ z ^ w ^ u ^ v;
371        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
372    }
373
374    @Override
375    public double getNoise(double x) {
376        return valueNoise(seed, x) * 2 - 1;
377    }
378
379    @Override
380    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, long seed) {
381        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x) * 2 - 1;
382    }
383
384    @Override
385    public double getNoise(double x, double y) {
386        return valueNoise(seed, x, y) * 2 - 1;
387    }
388    @Override
389    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, long seed) {
390        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x, y) * 2 - 1;
391    }
392    @Override
393    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z) {
394        return valueNoise(seed, x, y, z) * 2 - 1;
395    }
396    @Override
397    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, long seed) {
398        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x, y, z) * 2 - 1;
399    }
400    @Override
401    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w) {
402        return valueNoise(seed, x, y, z, w) * 2 - 1;
403    }
404    @Override
405    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, long seed) {
406        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x, y, z, w) * 2 - 1;
407    }
408    @Override
409    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u) {
410        return valueNoise(seed, x, y, z, w, u) * 2 - 1;
411    }
412    @Override
413    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, long seed) {
414        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x, y, z, w, u) * 2 - 1;
415    }
416    @Override
417    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v) {
418        return valueNoise(seed, x, y, z, w, u, v) * 2 - 1;
419    }
420    @Override
421    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v, long seed) {
422        return valueNoise((int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32), x, y, z, w, u, v) * 2 - 1;
423    }
424}
